elements.title: rabbits (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that rabbits can control their body temperature with their ears (pictured)?

elements.title: Christian Albright (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that both Christian Albright and De'Montre Tuggle were born on the same day, named second-team all-Mid-American Conference in 2020, signed with the Chicago Bears in 2022, and debuted in the CFL in 2023?

elements.title: their debut album (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that thrash metal band Hermética has a failed project to release a version of their debut album in English?

elements.title: Myvanwy Rhys (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Oxford suffragist Myvanwy Rhys earned first-class honours from Newnham College, Cambridge, but was denied a degree?

elements.title: Pell v The Queen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the verdict of Pell v The Queen could not be reported on properly for two months?

elements.title: Welsh children were not in school in 1821 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that approximately 85 per cent of Welsh children were not in school in 1821?

elements.title: Daughter's Daughter (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the scenes set in the United States in the Taiwanese film Daughter's Daughter were nearly omitted during the writing process but were retained at the insistence of lead actress Sylvia Chang?

elements.title: an Oklahoma TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that an Oklahoma TV station returned to its original call sign after the death of its founder, Gene Autry?

elements.title: Jamaludin Malik (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indonesian legislator Jamaludin Malik wore an Ultraman costume to his swearing-in ceremony?
